QuestData.Title: Arbiter in the Making
QuestData.Description:
Maw Walker, I ... I do not know what to say. I did not expect this.
She speaks of preparations and a new Arbiter. We must tell our friends in Haven.
QuestData.LogDescription: Go to Haven and deliver the news that Saezurah seeks a new Arbiter.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Deliver the news to Bolvar in Haven.
QuestData.RewardText: An Arbiter? I had not imagined we could set that to rights.
